definitions: a darkened box with a convex lens or aperture for projecting the image of an external object onto a screen inside. It is important historically in the development of photography.
shortDefinitions: darkened box with convex lens or aperture for projecting image of external object on to screen

definitions: a small round building with a rotating angled mirror at the apex of the roof, projecting an image of the landscape on to a horizontal surface inside.
shortDefinitions: small round building with rotating angled mirror at apex of roof
